articles.title: Erik Menendez in hospital, diagnosed with serious medical condition: Family - Yahoo Home
articles.description: Erik and Lyle Menendez have a parole hearing on Aug. 21.
articles.content:
Erik Menendez, 54, is in the hospital and has been diagnosed with a serious medical condition, his family confirmed to ABC News.
The condition has not been disclosed.
